title: RA Sushi offers Coconut Crème Brûlée as signature item
statement: RA Sushi serves a homemade coconut and vanilla crème brûlée garnished with a strawberry as a signature dessert item.

citations.quote: COCONUT CRÈME BRÛLÉE A decadent homemade coconut and vanilla crème brûlée, garnished with a strawberry Signature Item
